name: The Lamp Man
description: An atmospheric puzzle game where you solve the puzzle while keeping your light from going out. The puzzles are based on the well known “connect the pipes” puzzle, but with a simple twist: you can’t see the whole puzzle completely, you must base your solution on the plans that are scattered around the map (the plans are always close to the puzzle it depicts). Move by clicking your mouse (ARPG/Diablo style). We did not make our own humanoid animations, we used Kevin Iglesias’ free Unity Assets. We also used sound effects from freesound.org, but the music is custom made.
